presentationTable.name: Fragmented Measures
presentationTable.description: This folder contains Quota and Forecast Amt allocations derived based on Period Ago allocation rules.

presentationColumns.name: 1a- Revenue (DW History Data)
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Revenue data. Sources from Dollars physical column in FactsRev table joining to time using Billed time.  

- Returns sum of data over any selected dimensions
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.F1 Time Based Fragmentation.1a- Revenue (DW History Data)
